Application Insights.queryString:
AppRequests
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) and Success == false
| join kind= inner (
AppExceptions
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
) on OperationId
| project exceptionType = Type, failedMethod = Method, requestName = Name, requestDuration = DurationMs, _ResourceId

AppRequests
| where Success == false
| summarize failedCount=sum(ItemCount), impactedUsers=dcount(UserId) by OperationName, _ResourceId
| order by failedCount desc

AppRequests
| where Success == false
| summarize failedCount=sum(ItemCount) by Name
| top 10 by failedCount desc

AppDependencies
| where Success == false
| summarize totalCount=sum(ItemCount) by DependencyType
| top 5 by totalCount desc

AppRequests
| summarize RequestsCount=sum(ItemCount), AverageDuration=avg(DurationMs), percentiles(DurationMs, 50, 95, 99) by OperationName, _ResourceId | order by RequestsCount desc

AppPageViews
| where ClientType == 'Browser'
| summarize count_sum = sum(ItemCount) by bin(TimeGenerated,30m), _ResourceId

AppRequests
| summarize requestCount=sum(ItemCount), avgDuration=avg(DurationMs) by PerformanceBucket
| order by avgDuration asc | project-away avgDuration

AppRequests
| where TimeGenerated > ago(12h) 
| summarize avgRequestDuration=avg(DurationMs) by bin(TimeGenerated, 10m), _ResourceId

AppPageViews
| where notempty(DurationMs) and ClientType == 'Browser'
| extend total_duration=DurationMs*ItemCount
| summarize avg_duration=(sum(total_duration)/sum(ItemCount)) by OperationName
| top 3 by avg_duration desc

AppRequests
| summarize CountByCountry=count() by ClientCountryOrRegion
| top 10 by CountByCountry

AppExceptions
| where notempty(ClientBrowser) and ClientType == 'Browser'
| summarize total_exceptions = sum(ItemCount) by ProblemId
| top 3 by total_exceptions desc

App Service.displayName: App logs for each App Service
App Service.queryString: AppServiceAppLogs | project CustomLevel, _ResourceId | summarize count() by CustomLevel, _ResourceId
AppServiceHTTPLogs | summarize (count() - countif(ScStatus >= 500)) * 100.0 / count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), _ResourceId
AppServiceAppLogs | summarize count()  by CustomLevel, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), _ResourceId

App Service.displayName: Count of denied access from IP Security Audit Logs by resource in selected time range
App Service.queryString: AppServiceIPSecAuditLogs | where Result == "Denied"| summarize count() by  _ResourceId, CsHost, CIp, Details
FunctionAppLogs | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) | where Level == "Warning" or Level == "Error" | summarize count_per_app = count() by _ResourceId | sort by count_per_app desc

App Service.displayName: Find console logs relating to application startup

App Service.queryString:
FunctionAppLogs | where Category startswith "Function." and Message startswith "Executed "
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), FunctionName // Aggregate by hour
| render timechart

FunctionAppLogs
| where Category startswith "Function." and Message startswith "Executed "
| parse Message with "Executed '" Name "' ("  Result ", Id=" Id ", Duration=" Duration:long "ms)" | summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), Name, Result, _ResourceId
| order by TimeGenerated desc

FunctionAppLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where Category startswith "Function." and Message startswith "Executed "
| parse Message with "Executed '" Name "' ("  Result ", Id=" Id ", Duration=" Duration:long "ms)"
| project TimeGenerated, FunctionName, Result, FunctionInvocationId, Duration, _ResourceId
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

AzureMetrics 
| extend timeBin = bin(TimeGenerated, 5m) 
| summarize ResponseTime = sumif(Average, MetricName=="AverageResponseTime") by timeBin, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h) 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

AzureMetrics 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(12h)  
| where MetricName in ("Http2xx", "Http3xx", "Http4xx", "Http5xx") 
| summarize sum(Total) by MetricName

App Service.displayName: Show application logs from Function Apps
App Service.queryString:
FunctionAppLogs 
| project TimeGenerated, HostInstanceId, Message, _ResourceId
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

App Service.displayName: Show logs with warnings or exceptions
App Service.queryString:
FunctionAppLogs
| where Level == "Warning" or Level == "Error"
| project TimeGenerated, HostInstanceId, Level, Message, _ResourceId
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

let threshold=1000;
FunctionAppLogs
| where Category startswith "Function." and Message startswith "Executed "
| parse Message with "Executed '" Name "' ("  Result ", Id=" Id ", Duration=" Duration:long "ms)"
| project TimeGenerated, FunctionName, Result, FunctionInvocationId, Duration, _ResourceId
| where Duration > threshold 
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

AppServiceHTTPLogs
| top-nested of _ResourceId by dummy=max(0), top-nested 5 of UserAgent by count()
| project-away dummy

AppServiceHTTPLogs
| top-nested of _ResourceId by dummy=max(0), top-nested 5 of CIp by count()
| project-away dummy

Azure Spring Apps.displayName: Show the application logs which contain the "error" or "exception" terms
Azure Spring Apps.queryString:
AppPlatformLogsforSpring
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1h)
| where Log contains "error" or Log contains "exception"
| project TimeGenerated , ServiceName , AppName , InstanceName , Log , _ResourceId

AppPlatformSystemLogs 
| where LogType == "ConfigServer" and Level in ("WARN", "ERROR")
| project TimeGenerated , Level , ServiceName , Thread , Stack , Log , _ResourceId 
| limit 100

Azure Spring Apps.displayName: Show the error and exception number of each application
Azure Spring Apps.queryString:
AppPlatformLogsforSpring 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where Log contains "error" or Log contains "exception"
| extend FullAppName = strcat(ServiceName, "/", AppName)
| summarize count_per_app = count() by FullAppName, ServiceName, AppName, _ResourceId
| sort by count_per_app desc

AppPlatformSystemLogs 
| where LogType == "ServiceRegistry" and Level in ("WARN", "ERROR")
| project TimeGenerated , Level , ServiceName , Thread , Stack , Log , _ResourceId 
| limit 100
